segments.text: I would like to buy some local handcrafts as gifts to my friends and relatives .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are many stores selling handcrafts in Paris . Our store is wellknown for vase , table wear and jewelry boxes . You can take your time and choose whatever you like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , the tapestry is delicate and beautiful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have made an excellent choice , it is our newcomer . The tapestry is on hot sell with the design and quality . The design on it is traditional Paris architecture .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mmm , it is reasonable . Look at this set of table wear , it is so beautiful !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a piece of table clothing to go with it . It is a brocade one with pretty stars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This silver vase is a good ornament for the living room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will take the tapestry , the set of table wear and the vase .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Do you like these candles ? They are on sale now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I will take one .
segments.speaker: S1
